column5: My son left his rod and reel (he remembered his sister's) at the launch Saturday September 8th. Pflueger reel, Berkley rod, bright yellow braid, may have had a pop-r style lure on it. Went back Sunday and is wasn't there. Reward. Call or text me at 705 795 6579. Thanks.
What launch were you guys at?
Geezz I'll bet the little guy feels horrible. Hope someone posts it "FOUND" somewhere.

Ya, it was his first very own rod and reel and he feels pretty bad. The flip side is he isn't going to miss out on a fishing trip because of it and maybe he'll learn a lesson on keeping track of his stuff. All part of growing up.
